concept.title: Correlation
concept.shortdesc: The relationship between two Traffic reports in a report suite. You can run correlation reports by breaking down report data. For example, you can run a correlation breakdown report that shows visitor age group correlated with the type of search engine the visitors use.

conbody.p: Correlations are particularly useful for understanding the relationships between two or more Traffic Custom Insight variables, or other system variables. Correlations come in three sizes (2, 5, and 20), based on the number of items that are correlated together at the same time.
Ad hoc: see Break Down Table Data.
